angstd.ui.views.view.manager
Class AbstractComponentManager<T extends AngstdData,C extends ViewComponent>

java.lang.Object
  angstd.ui.views.view.manager.DefaultViewManager
      angstd.ui.views.view.manager.AbstractComponentManager<T,C>
Type Parameters:
T -
C -
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentManager<T,C>, ViewManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
DomainArrangementComponentManager
public abstract class AbstractComponentManager<T extends AngstdData,C extends ViewComponent>
extends DefaultViewManager
implements ComponentManager<T,C>

Basic implementation for the ComponentManager interface.

This class implements the basic functionalities for a ComponentManager. The getComponent() method is abstract, because the ViewComponent creation has to be managed in there.

The DefaultViewManager is extended to ensure the communication with the observed view.

For further details see ComponentManager interface.

Author:
Andreas Held
See Also:
ComponentManager, ComponentManager
